quote: Where are the memories that held us together? Where are the dreams that were yet to come? I'm afraid to be happy. I shouldn't be happy. If I'm happy without you does that mean I've told you goodbye?
quote_letters: WHERE ARE THE MEMORIES THAT HELD US TOGETHER WHERE ARE THE DREAMS THAT WERE YET TO COME IM AFRAID TO BE HAPPY I SHOULDNT BE HAPPY IF IM HAPPY WITHOUT YOU DOES THAT MEAN IVE TOLD YOU GOODBYE
